solid.notes: EU buyers can order directly from their webstore. US buyers can contact them directly and they'll send a paypal invoice plus 50 EUR shipping. Cutter and P Team are each also available with different top graphics.

splitboards.notes: EU buyers can order directly from their webstore. US buyers can contact them directly and they'll send a paypal invoice plus $60 (50 EUR) shipping. Crude is also available with different top graphics.

solid.notes: Ships from France. If shipping to the USA you may have the VAT removed.
Ships from Japan. North America shipping is $200 (¥21,600), Europe shipping is $300 (¥32,400).

splitboards.notes: Ships from Japan. North America shipping is $200 (¥21,600), Europe shipping is $300 (¥32,400).

solid.notes: Shipping to the USA is $60 (50 EUR).

splitboards.notes: Shipping to the USA is $60 (50 EUR).

solid.notes: Ships to Europe. The prices listed are their 'sale' price, which we have reason to belive are the fulltime price. If this changes we'll update the listings below.
Ships from Germany. Measurements are listed in their katalog.

custom.notes: Deviation Works offers a custom option starting at $1000.

solid.notes: Deviation Works offers a custom option starting at $1000.
Backwoods has an additional graphics option.

splitboards.notes: Backwoods also has an additional Carbon model and a different graphics model.

custom.notes: Winterstick will customize the width of a board for $100 more. Shown here are the stock ultrawide snowboards. All models available as a splitboard.

solid.notes: Winterstick will customize the width of a board for $100 more. Shown here are the stock ultrawide snowboards. All models available as a splitboard.

splitboards.notes: Winterstick will customize the width of a board for $100 more. Shown here are the stock ultrawide snowboards. All models available as a splitboard.

solid.notes: Ships from Austria.

Due to supply chain issues Never Summer has cut the Westbound and Heritage boards from their lineup this year. Some additional models may have DF versions added in January 2022, please contact Never Summer to be added to a mailing list for announcements.
Northwave publishes their board dimensions in their catalog (page 82).
On their website the 150cm is the only Airtime size, but their splitboard version has a 160 with 28.1cm waist. Maybe in the future they'll release the solid wide version.

splitboards.notes: Technically, the Split Bean snowboard has a 28.1cm waist, but at 144cm long it's much too short for most big foot riders.

solid.notes: Most of the boards on their website are missing size information.

splitboards.notes: Most of the boards on their website are missing size information.

solid.notes: The Lumberjack could be an option, but the waist is slightly too small (27.3) to make it to this list.

splitboards.notes: Rome carries the Uprise splitboard but does not list the specs.

solid.notes: Last year they had their 'Escape' model, but it looks like that's been dropped for the 2021/2022 season.
Custom boards start at $1400.

custom.notes: Their stock models max out at 27.0cm, but custom options up to 35.0cm are available starting at $2600 (2400 CHF).

solid.notes: The Yes 420 Unic. JPS is 28.6cm (one of the widest available!), but the extreme shortness makes it unsuitable for larger riders.
Voile only makes splitboards, no traditional snowboards.

splitboards.notes: Voile's maximum width is 26.5cm. Note that they also sell DIY conversion kits to convert your solid ultrawide board to a split.

solid.notes: SwellPanik does not publish any clear board dimensions.

custom.notes: Spline has a standard lineup, but starting at $2000CAD they'll make a custom board for your. Their standard lineup maxes out at 26.1cm waist width.

solid.notes: Spline has a standard lineup, but starting at $2000CAD they'll make a custom board for your. Their standard lineup maxes out at 26.1cm waist width.
Chimera only makes splitboards, no traditional snowboards.
Aotea makes each board on demand but there's no option to customize the size. Ships from NZ.

splitboards.notes: Aotea makes each board on demand but there's no option to customize the size. Ships from NZ.

solid.notes: Atlantis Snowboards have not released their 2021-2022 lineup yet.

Boheme does not publish board dimensions.

solid.notes: The website has 404 links for the board specs, so unable to confirm for the 2021-2022 season. Last year they maxed out at 26.5
